net.antidot.api.search

Class QueryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.antidot.api.search.QueryManager

  • public class QueryManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages query.

    Instances of this class should be used to query Antidot search engine.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public byte[] send(Query query)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Sends new query to Antidot search engine.
        Parameters:
        query - [in] query to submit.
        Returns:
        reply in Google protobuf format.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - various error can occur when querying web services.
